item.title: Studio Flow
item.description: Send an HTTP request with customer parameters to a Studio Flow. SEND & WAIT Send an HTTP request to a Studio Flow, which sends an outgoing message to the recipient and Waits for a Reply to generate an auto-response. console.log("API PARAMS: ..\/params\/studio.js", apiParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ document .
